title: Announcing: The Sleepy Bookshelf Premium
description:
Elizabeth explains the brand new premium offering for The Sleepy Bookshelf. 

By signing up, you'll enjoy all of our sleepy episodes completely ad-free and get exclusive access to bonus episodes in between longer books. The first premium episodes will come this weekend (December 11 & 12), so sign up now! We return to our next free book on Tuesday (December 14).

Try The Sleepy Bookshelf Premium free for 7 days: https://sleepybookshelf.supercast.com/.  Or sign up directly within Apple Podcasts to get premium access to The Sleepy Bookshelf and the other sleep-inducing podcasts from Slumber Studios, including Get Sleepy and Deep Sleep Sounds.

Thank you so much for your support of the show. Sweet dreams ðŸ¥± ðŸ˜´
